mcchatgpt.auth.message1: §cPlease authenticate with an OpenAI token using /mcchatgpt-auth <token>
mcchatgpt.auth.message2: §cIf you do not have a token, you can generate one here:
mcchatgpt.ask.error: §b[MCChatGPT]: §cAn error occurred while communicating with OpenAI. Please check your internet connection, or try again later.
mcchatgpt.ask.quota: §b[MCChatGPT]: §cYou have exceeded your current OpenAI API quota. Click me to view your plan and billing details.
